page.title: 12Education in Bramdean
page.content: There is a play group for the under fives at Cheriton, a village 2 miles to the west. There are other nursery education facilities within 5 miles. Hinton Ampner primary school lies within the area; it places great emphasis on a family atmosphere for children between the ages of 5 and 11. The school was closed in 1985, the children being sent to Cheriton School. The nearest school for children between 11 and 16 is the Community School in Alresford. For those wishing to continue full time education there is a 6th Form College in Winchester. Transport is provided for all children between 5 and 18. Adult education facilities are available at the Community School. There is a Krishnamurti Foundation and residential school for adults.
